TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DbCommandBuilder extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public MustInherit Class DbCommandBuilder Inherits Component
public ref class DbCommandBuilder abstract : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 自動產生單一資料表命令，可用來調解對 的變更和相關的資料庫。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated database.

summary.span: 這是只能被繼承的抽象類別。

span.span: This is an abstract class that can only be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方便的提供者撰寫人員建立自己的命令產生器。The class is provided for the convenience of provider writers creating their own command builders. 藉由繼承自這個類別，開發人員可以在自己的程式碼中實作提供者特定的行為。By inheriting from this class, developers can implement provider specific behavior in their own code. 調解所做的變更所需的 SQL 陳述式不會自動產生與相關聯的資料來源。The does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a with the associated data source. 不過，您可以建立物件來自動產生單一資料表更新的 SQL 陳述式，如果您設定屬性。However, you can create a object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the property of the . 然後，您未設定任何其他 SQL 陳述式由產生。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the . 自己註冊為接聽程式事件，每當您設定屬性。The registers itself as a listener for events whenever you set the property. 您只能將一個或彼此物件一次。You can only associate one or object with each other at one time. 若要產生 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式使用屬性，以自動擷取一組必要中繼資料。To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the uses the property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically. 如果您變更中繼資料擷取 （例如，在第一次的更新） 之後，您應該呼叫更新的中繼資料的方法。If you change the after the metadata has been retrieved (for example, after the first update), you should call the method to update the metadata. `SelectCommand` 還必須傳回至少一個主索引鍵或唯一的資料行。The `SelectCommand` must also return at least one primary key or unique column. 如果沒有，會產生例外狀況，並不會產生命令。If none exist, an exception is generated, and the commands are not generated. 也會使用， ，以及屬性所參考。The also uses the , , and properties referenced by the . 使用者應該呼叫修改這些屬性，則本身會被取代。The user should call if any of these properties are modified, or if the itself is replaced. 否則， ，和屬性會保留其先前的值。Otherwise the , , and properties retain their previous values. 如果您呼叫，則解除關聯，以及無法再使用產生的命令。If you call , the is disassociated from the , and the generated commands are no longer used.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public method and the `Finalize` method. 叫用受保護disposing 參數設定為方法`true`。 invokes the protected method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
Automatically Generating Commands
ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 取得在資料來源上執行刪除時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫修改相關聯的命令文字，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the associated command text, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生的 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，仍會使用從先前的陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. SQL 陳述式是第一個應用程式呼叫時產生或。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 如果多載的版本可讓您藉由提供布林值，指定此行為可能會造成產生根據資料行名稱改為傳遞的參數`True`。If the overloaded version of allows you to specify this behavior by supplying a Boolean value, you can cause the to generate parameters based on the column names instead by passing `True`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫修改命令文字，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生的 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，仍會使用從先前的陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. SQL 陳述式是第一個應用程式呼叫時產生或。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 傳遞`true`for`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 符合下列條件時，才會如此成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定，且其長度等於或大於產生的參數名稱。The has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 產生的參數名稱符合指定準則規則運算式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - A指定。A is specified.

SQL 陳述式是第一個應用程式呼叫時產生或。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 如果多載的版本可讓您指定此行為，您可能會造成產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。If the overloaded version of allows you to specify this behavior, you can cause the to generate parameters based on the column names instead.

summary.span: 取得在資料來源上執行更新時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform updates at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫修改命令文字，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生的 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，仍會使用從先前的陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. SQL 陳述式是第一個應用程式呼叫時產生或。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 如果多載的版本可讓您指定此行為，您可能會造成產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。If the overloaded version of allows you to specify this behavior, you can cause the to generate parameters based on the column names instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫修改命令的文字，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify command text, and then explicitly set that on the . 第一次產生的 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確呼叫如果它會變更以任何方式陳述式。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否則，仍會使用從先前的陳述式，因此可能不正確的資訊。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. SQL 陳述式是第一個應用程式呼叫時產生或。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 傳遞`true`for`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 根據資料行名稱的參數產生成功，必須符合下列條件：Generation of the parameters based on column names succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定，且其長度等於或大於產生的參數名稱。The has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 產生的參數名稱符合指定準則規則運算式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - A指定。A is specified.

summary.span: 取得或設定開始字元 (一個或多個)，當指定其名稱包含空白或保留語彙基元 (Token) 之類字元的資料庫物件時，就可以使用。

span.span: Gets or sets the beginning character or characters to use when specifying database objects (for example, tables or columns) whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
The beginning character or characters to use.
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些資料來源可能可以包含字元，例如空格、 逗號和分號的物件。Some data sources may have objects that can contain characters such as spaces, commas, and semicolons. 若要因應這項功能，使用和屬性，以指定分隔符號，例如左括號和右方括號，將封裝的物件名稱。To accommodate this capability, use the and properties to specify delimiters such as a left bracket and a right bracket to encapsulate the object name. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您無法變更或是屬性之後插入、 更新或刪除已經產生命令，您可以變更其設定之後呼叫`Update`方法。Although you cannot change the or properties after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the `Update` method of a .

exception.span: 在已經產生插入、更新或刪除命令之後，無法變更這個屬性。

span.span: This property cannot be changed after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated.

summary.span: 取得或設定用於結構描述識別項和任何其他識別項間之分隔符號的字元。

span.span: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.

value.span: 當做結構描述分隔符號使用的字元。

span.span: The character to be used as the schema separator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，資料庫伺服器，表示識別項的結構描述分隔從具有某些字元之識別項的結構描述名稱。Generally, database servers indicate the schema for an identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character. 例如，SQL Server 會使用冒號，例如建立完整的識別項**人員： CustomerName**，其中 「 Person 」 是結構描述名稱，而"CustomerName"為識別項。For example, SQL Server uses a colon, creating complete identifiers such as **Person:CustomerName**, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier. 設定這個屬性可讓開發人員可以修改此行為。Setting this property allows developers to modify this behavior.

span.span: Automatically Generating Commands
ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 指定更新陳述式中包含所有資料行值或只包含已變更的資料行值。

span.span: Specifies whether all column values in an update statement are included or only changed ones.

value.span: 如果 所產生的 UPDATE 陳述式包含所有資料行，則為 ，如果只包含已變更的資料行，則為 。

span.span: if the UPDATE statement generated by the includes all columns; if it includes only changed columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UPDATE 陳述式所產生可以包含更新的相關資訊的資料行，或它可以包含其值已變更的資料行的相關資訊。The UPDATE statement generated by a can include update information about all the columns, or it can include information only about those columns whose values have changed. 設定屬性設`true`導致產生的 UPDATE 陳述式，以包含所有資料行，不論是否有變更過其值。Setting the property to `true` causes the generated UPDATE statement to include all the columns, whether their values have changed or not.
